text.more: This visualization is the product of Alexandria Suarez's Spring 2019 Capstone project. This project serves as the final course towards the completion of an MSIS at the University of Texas at Austin School of Information.
text.intro: A visualization of 19th-century photographs of Mexican leaders and politicians. This visualization focuses on the photographers that took the photographs as well as their subjects and the relationships between them.
text.title: Visualizing the 19th-century Mexican Political Sphere
